snippet.title: FRONT MISSION 2: Remake || New Platforms Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Wanzers take over new platforms! FRONT MISSION 2: Remake launches on Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, and Xbox Series S on April 30th worldwide!


Preludium of Alordesh Civil War starts now! Free demo of FRONT MISSION 2: Remake will be available on Steam, starting April 5th. Savegame from the demo version will carry over to the full game upon its worldwide release!


Wishlist on:

⚫Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2865440/FRONT_MISSION_2_Remake/
🟢Xbox https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/front-mission-2-remake/9nhc4qvdwwvp
🔵PlayStation https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010191

Try free demo: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2865440/FRONT_MISSION_2_Remake/
-----------------------
